item.title: I know this is a dumb question
item.dc:creator: @Snackman Snackman
item.description:
@Snackman wrote:

well, if I get your question, there goes nothing after “absX” and “absY”.

This piece of code tells you this:

if your X coord is bigger than 2941 and smaller than 3392, and Y is bigger than 3518 and smaller than 3968 (i.e: X: 2946 Y: 3742), you're standing inside the wilderness. (return true;)

Read full topic
item.source: I know this is a dumb question

item.title: I know this is a dumb question
item.dc:creator: @All_Time_Low All Time Low
item.description:
@All_Time_Low wrote:

I know this is a dumb question… but what goes next to “absX” and “absY”? I’m trying to make Camelot PvP. Help Please?

public boolean inWild() { Client c = (Client)this; if(CastleWars.isInCw(c) || isInFala() || inFunPk()) { return true; } if(absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 3518 && absY < 3968 || absX > 2941 && absX < 3392 && absY > 9918 && absY < 10367){ return true; }

Read full topic
item.source: I know this is a dumb question
